summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 78E, page 184 of of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property at 1040 South Henderson Street from Single Family 5000 (SF 500) to Lowrise 3 (L3) and to grant a conditional use permit for the development of a nursing home and child care center (Sea Mar Nursing Home) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (petition of Donald King, Sea Mar Community Health Centers, Inc., C.F. 298192).
